survey_name: Smart Grocery Shopping Cart Adoption Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and barriers regarding the adoption of smart grocery shopping carts equipped with technology such as barcode scanners, digital payment integration, and real-time spending trackers.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with smart grocery shopping carts that feature barcode scanners and digital payment options?
answer_options: Very familiar, I've used them before
Somewhat familiar, I've seen them in stores
Not very familiar, but I've heard of them
questions.client_notes: Ensure the question is clear and avoids technical jargon. Use a simple 4-point scale for familiarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button response options. Randomize option order to minimize bias.

questions.question_text: Which of the following features would most encourage you to use a smart grocery shopping cart? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Navigation assistance to find items in-store
Recipe suggestions based on cart items
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Somewhat familiar' or higher in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multiple selection allowed. Include 'None of the above' to capture disinterest.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox response options with a maximum of 3 selections allowed.
